name: Nova Lands Alliance
description:
Welcome to the Nova Lands Alliance, the New Homeland International Chain Alliance, meticulously crafted by Bumblebee Meta Ltd. We are an innovative Web3 community financial product aimed at providing community investors with generous annualized and dividend returns, reaching 6%+12%+24%+12%+6%*X. Supported by digital assets, Web3, exchanges, and other tools, we achieve daily settlements and periodic dividends, offering multiple income targets, including Digital Equity Hub dividends, underlying blockchain PMC appreciation, PMC mining revenue, Parallel Universe Mining Farms, and referral rewards.
Income Targets Introduction:
Digital Equity Hub Dividends: As the world's largest distributed digital equity exchange in the Web3.0 era, the Dubai Nova Lands Alliance provides a fast track to Web3 for global enterprises, accelerating digital transformation.
Underlying Blockchain PMC Appreciation: We have chosen PMChain as the underlying blockchain, which boasts outstanding technical advantages, including high TPS (5000/second), 1-millisecond transaction confirmation time, and multi-chain/cross-chain support.
PMC Mining and Parallel Universe Mining Farms: PMC mining yields a 20% return within two years, offering users significant benefits from mining and appreciation. The Parallel Universe Mining Farms provide users with more wealth opportunities.
Referral Rewards: We have a lucrative referral reward mechanism; invite more friends to join and share the opportunity to create digital wealth together.
Nova Lands Alliance, helping you easily achieve wealth growth.
Download the APP and enjoy a smooth experience on the wealth express!
